english.segment1: just don't say no. i just wanna play. and can you even see. eyes closed but they talk to me. 'cause i know of a place that i trust. if you could only see. eyes closed but they talk to me so
english.segment2: it just doesn't matter anymore. sacred. 'cause what i see and what i feel is real. sacred. i can't hide these things inside of me. sacred. so ask me how i feel
english.segment3: and i see you. in the crowd just by my side. and can you even see. that i'm anguished and your just killing me. 'cause i know of a place that i trust. if you could only see. eyes closed but they talk to me so
english.segment4: it just doesn't matter anymore. sacred. 'cause what i see and what i feel is real. sacred. i can't hide these things inside of me. sacred. so ask me how i feel
english.segment5: pushed and shoved. used and abused. oh GOD. oh please, would you. hear my cry
english.segment6: are you in a lie. as the souls now. and they cry and they cry and they cry. shhhhh. hey kid, do you see. do you feel. do you believe
